title: Wheeler Dealers: Dream Car
overview: Mike Brewer is taking on his toughest challenge yet, as he turns his attention to people who lack the know-how or resources to get their dream motor. Each episode sees Mike and his trusted mechanic Marc â€˜Elvis' Priestley meet a new client and find inventive ways to add value to their existing vehicle, before flipping it for a profit and reinvesting the proceeds in a series of trade-ups that result in a dream car.
